page.title: 18Playground Games
page.content: {Piggy on the Railway}is a skipping game. You jump into the rope and skip. The song goes like this. Piggy on the railway Picking up stones Along came an engine And broke Piggy's bones. Oi said Piggy Thats not fair Tough said the engine driver I don't care Piggy on one leg (3times) Piggy on two legs (3times) Piggy on three legs (3times) Piggy on four legs (3times) Piggy does the splits When you do the splits you jump in the air and try and put your legs each side of the rope. If you miss you have to turn an end of the rope and the game goes on.
